HPI 8153 Toyota Celica GT-Four (ST185) 1994 Tour de Corse – Rallye de France Winner D. Auriol/B. Occelli

14th WRC win for Didier Auriol
26th WRC win for Toyota
14th WRC win for Toyota Celica GT-Four (ST185)



Didier Auriol dominated the rally from start to finish, taking 13 stage wins out of 23 stages, and never ceding to lead to Carlos Sainz.

As for the model, it looks like this is around the time when HPI started highlighting the panel gaps (which was continued by Ignition). As much as I don't like it, at least highlight all of the panel gaps. Why only the door? While there were 16 winning ST185s, HPI only modeled 3 of them. It would have been nice to see more of these.
